title.narrative: SURVEYS, STUDIES, AND DATA MANAGEMENT

description.narrative: By 2016, systems for monitoring disaggregated data and analysis on the situation of children and women are strengthened and regularly updated to inform policy., which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Human Rights Institutions, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Public Finance And Local Governance, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2016, a social protection system with adequate financial resources for the most disadvantaged will be set up and institutional and civil society capacities will be strenghtened

participating-org.narrative: MINISTERIO DO TRABALHO SOLIDARIEDAD FAMILIA E PROTECAO SOCIAL

sector.narrative: Administrative data, registers and non-MICS household surveys and censuses
CRC, CEDAW or CRPD - follow up on concluding observations
Child marriage - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Child poverty measurement: support to routine national measurement of monetary and multidimensional child poverty
Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Legal and policy framework related to violence, exploitation and abuse
Situation Analysis or Update on women and children
Stimulating demand for and capacity to use data

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2016, systems for monitoring disaggregated data and analysis on the situation of children and women are strengthened andregularly updated to inform policy.

description.narrative: Generation and dissemination of data continued during 2016 through the publication and presentation of the Situation of children and women to Government and Parliament and the completion of study on adolescents and youth. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2016
